entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Val-d'Or
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -17.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -17.1°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -19.2°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
